Method Detail

run

public OptInfo run(DepotLinkedList mainDepots)
This module will attempt to split each truck into a number of smaller trucks, and see whether the total costs of the smaller trucks are cheaper than the total cost of the original trucks. This method does the selection of the truck being splitted, and then called AttemptToSplitRoute() to do the actual splitting. Author: Dilsara Pathirana

Overrides:
run in class MixedFleetOptimization
Returns:
Boolean value stating whether the module found any improvements
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

AttemptToSplitRoute

public boolean AttemptToSplitRoute(Depot depot,
                                   Truck originalTruck,
                                   TruckType truckType)
This method attempts to split a truck into a number of smaller trucks. If the total costs of the new trucks are cheaper than the cost of the original truck, then the split is successful. Author: Dilsara Pathirana

Parameters:
originalTruck - The truck being splitted
truckType - The truck type of the smaller trucks to be splitted into.
Returns:
A boolean value stating whether this method successfully completed.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

setSwapConfirm

public void setSwapConfirm(SwapConfirm c)
Sets the confirmation function for the swaps. This function will determine if the swaps are executed based upon the cost difference.

Parameters:
c - swap confirmation class
